meanings.sent1: The old attic was cobwebbier than the basement.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house was cobwebbier than any other on the street.
meanings.sent3: The Halloween decorations made the house look even cobwebbier than usual.
meanings.sent4: Her neglect of cleaning had turned her room into a cobwebbier mess than she realized.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house was so cobwebbier that visitors could hardly see through the thick webs.

meanings.definition: Having more cobwebs than something else
meanings.sent1: The neglected shed was cobwebbier than the garage.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned mansion was cobwebbier than the small cottage nearby.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the cobwebbier house on the block was fierce.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was cobwebbier than a forgotten attic, filled with memories long untouched.
meanings.sent5: The forest path grew cobwebbier as they ventured deeper into the woods.
